original_text: There Barak summoned Zebulun and Naphtali, and ten thousand men went up under his command. Deborah also went up with him.
korean_text: 바락이 스불론과 납달리를 게데스로 부르니 만 명이 그를 따라 올라가고 드보라도 그와 함께 올라가니라

sentences.original_text: There Barak summoned Zebulun and Naphtali
and ten thousand men went up under his command
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 지휘 아래 만 명의 군사들이 올라갔으며

sentences.original_text: Deborah also went up with him
